item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 22, 2024 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:

2. FaSTer: Atari ST Digital Magazine (15 points | 2 comments)
3. A “meta-optics” camera that is the size of a grain of salt (104 points | 67 comments)
